author: dlestrat
msg: Added test coverage for getPortletApplication(ObjectId).  This needs to be validated with MySql.

author: dlestrat
msg: In getPortletApplication(ObjectId) the id was not converted to long which was causing a class cast exception with MySql in OJB.
